site_name: Hallfield Primary School Porchester GardensLondonW2 6JJ
description: T2 Silver birch: lift 2.5m above ground level; T5 London plane: reduce extended limb over playground by 2m; T7 Sycamore: reduce north west leader (dying back) by up to 4m, reduce east limb by up to 3m, reduce central leader by up to 2m, reduce smaller limb on east leader by up to 2m; T15 Holly: lift to 2m from ground level and cut back from building by up to 0.5m; T18 Field maple: lift to 2.5m from ground level; T20 London plane: selective reduction of 2 branches by 2m as detailed in aerial inspection document; T25a Tree of heaven (nr T25 Rowan) fell and poison;  T31 Lime: lift to 4m above ground level; T35 Lime: remove basal growth, lift to 3m over path and 4m over road; T36 maple: lift to 4m above ground level; T37 Lime: lift to 3m over path and 4m over road; T39 lime: lift to 4m above ground level; T41 Elder: lift to 3m above ground level; T42 Lime: remove lower epicormic growth to crown break; T43 Lime: lift to 4m above ground level; T45 Cherry: lift to 3m over path 3 and 4m over road; T46 Hawthorn: lift low canopy to 2.5m above ground level; T56 Lime: lift to 4m above ground level; T60 Mulberry: reduce south limb by up to 1m; T61 Horse chestnut: Reduction of up to 1.5m on branch in north-west section, reduction of up to 2m on branch in west quadrant, reduction of up to 1.5m on branch in east; T 62 Lime: crown reduce to near previous, most recent reduction points, retaining shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of fine branch structure for crown continuity; T64 Horse chestnut: reduce larger of 2 crossing branches at 12m in south-east quadrant by up to 1.5m, reduce north west limb at 8m, by up to 1.5m, reduce 2 larger crossing branches at 22m by up to 2m; T66 Hazel: reduce damaged branch growing in north-west direction by up to 1m.
